name: loop-drop-app
description: MIDI looper, modular synth and sampler app built using Web Audio and Web MIDI APIs

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

packageJSON.name: loop-drop
packageJSON.description: MIDI looper, modular synth and sampler app built around Novation Launchpad controller (electron app).

commit.message: yeah it's a mess right now, but github's good a backup as any right?

releases.body:
**From v2.17.0**

**Enhancements:**
- added direct record into sample and granular sources
- drag and drop improvements (drag sources/processors between slots, samples between trimmers)
- recordings: highlight in the sidebar what file is currently recording
- sample loader: now supports all kinds media files (video/audio)
- all launchpads: added offbeat repeater mode (hold `select` + `repeat rate`)
- when LFO or ENV has been manually linked to a param, show this in editor
- modulators now get frozen on suppress to fix pitch changing for sounds with long release
- global launch control xl: double tapping suppress button closes that setup

**Fixes:**
- eq: fix default values
- launchpad mini: fix swap target
- improved failure mode of scheduling: if it can't play in time, don't play at all
- fix some glitches with the new oscillators (pitch modulators not working on start)
- fix display of toggle buttons

- synth and slicer: fix linking to modulator params
- slicer: fix updating of triggers on controllers

- Fix oneshot envelopes
- Scheduling tweaks

**Enhancements:**
- Added new drum synth sources (kick, snare, clap, cymbal - more to come)
- Spawn params directly from knobs in slot editor
- Added button to minimise all chunks in setup
- Controllers now only show supported midi ports in drop down selector
- Finally added **swap target** button to Launchpad controllers that lets you use a single launchpad with multiple controller instances and switch between easily.
- Highlight chunk when selected on Launchpad

**New controller support:**
- Launchpad MK2 with RGB lights
- Launch Control XL mixer control for selected chunks and switchable to global control (with per setup volume low/high pass)

**Bug fixes:**
- `chokeGroup` on individual slots now work again
- fix clicks on param adjustment
- only activate rename after slot has been selected
- repeater: fix missing beats on rate change

**Enhancements:**
- rewrote loop engine - now resumes long held notes, among other improvements
- project: move items to trash instead of destroying on delete
- smoother param changes
- now using AGPL-3.0 license

**Fixes:**
- global launch control: fix suppress others after setup has been closed
- improve meddler switching (less pops)

- fix popping on timestretch
- make global launch control work on non Mac OS platforms

- swing no longer included in flatten
- fix initial display of meddler editor
- fix performance issue on choking oneshot samples
- fix refreshing of params on drop down selector
- fix chokeAll on chromatic chunks

**New Features**
- Added experimental Ableton Push support
- Controllers are now hot-swappable - no longer need to restart the app when plugging in devices!
- A midi port is now automatically assigned when controllers are added to a setup
- Added new compressor effect
- Now supports international keyboard layouts (qwertz, etc)

**Delay**:
- Added ping pong option

**Slicer**:
- improve performance
- added new 'Snap to Peaks' mode

**Fixes**:
- Everything works much better and less glitchy!
- RMS level meter now displays correctly
- No more glitching when adjusting parameters or switching tabs
- No longer gets progressively slower over time
- Fix in and out points on pitched oneshot samples
- Meddler no longer cuts off delay and reverb trails when triggering off

- **slicer:** rename "transients" to "peaks" as this reflects the truth better
- fix peak slicing offset incorrect on first slice
- fix font on file chooser button on Mac OS El Capitan

**Enhancements**:
- Session Record now includes preroll since application loaded, never miss a thing!
- double clicking now resets params to default value
- lock in held triggers (in addition to repeated triggers)
- beat repeat now has priority over all other transforms (suppress no longer mutes repeat)
- added chokeGroup to all chunks under raw editor
- Global Launch Control now uses "sticky setups" and no longer shows other items

**Bug fixes:**
- fix recording pause on any digital silence
- fix meddler feedback
- triggers that are held longer than loop length are now included in loop
- fix triggers not turning off immediately when cleared
- better handling of held triggers when switching modes (use route stack)
- smooth midi param scheduling
- fix font display under Mac OS El Capitan
- stop continuous reloading of raw editor when editing synths/slicers
- recording editor: fix splice
- recording editor: improve decoding refresh performance

**Enhancements:**
- support for global controllers (currently only Novation Launch Control)
- duplicate chunks directly on loop grid (alt + drag)
- lots of internal restructuring (it's now way simpler to add your own nodes!)
- project level settings are now persisted (tempo, swing, zoom, global controllers)
- chunk styling improvements
- spawn modulators directly from params
- spawn meddlers directly from output routing

**New Chunks:**
- slicer (grid or transient based)
- synth (3xOsc with built-in filters, eq)
- meddler (chaining fx chunk - like _the finger_)

**New Processors:**
- EQ (low, mid, high, lowcut, highcut)
- Ring Modulator

**Recording Enhancements:**
- show beats on timeline
- move to next beat with arrow keys
- added slice/splice (or 'S' shortcut)
- trim and slice snaps to beats
- duplicate (select + 'D')
- center on zoom

**Bug fixes:**
- more rename bug fixing
- sample trimmer drop no longer restricted to wave format
- fix wave export (can now be opened in Ableton Live)
- fix glitchy auto-scroll to selected chunk
- fix refresh of setups on create/rename

**Enhancements:**
- added global swing
- added tap tempo and nudge buttons to sidebar
- recordings are now shown in sidebar and can be trimmed using basic audio editor (lots more coming)

**Fixes:**
- fix sample trimmer goes blank sometimes
- fix chunk reorder bugs
- prevent creating a chunk with the same name as another
- disable global trackpad zoom
- fix corrupted Qwerty Keys setup

- stop samples from opening in iTunes on slot drop
- improve recording performance

- add param rounding option (force whole values on params like pitch, offset)
- revert electron update (caused additional cpu usage and glitching)
- Fix broken **virtual-dom** dep

**Enhancements**:
- add a bunch of periodic waves (wavetable) to oscillators
- improved synced granular/timestretch sample editor - now allows specifying tempo and beat offsets
- moved param modulators to drop down menu
- multiple modulators can now be applied to one param
- new param linking - use max / min instead of relative values
- add extend.js for putting user code hackery
- tab bar no longer says "Setup", and shows full relative chunk path

**Fixes:**
- modulators are now contextual to the target they are being added to
- reduced audio glitching when editing params, switching between tabs, and loading other setups
- fix chunk drag n drop when scrolled
- fix renaming files (broken since windows fix 2.9.2)
- fix broken LFO start values

- fix some styling issues
- cross platform demo-project resolution

## Fixes
- stop sounds from going _poof_ when params are twiddled (hopefully)
- fix sizing of toggle buttons
- envelope value is now a mod-param

### New Features
- **add [freeverb](https://github.com/livejs/freeverb) as option when choosing reverb**. To use, add a reverb processor and select `fast`.

### Windows Bug Fix
- **fix setup tab not being selected on open** - due to path handling error
- **Added suppress/remove notes when using qwerty keys.** Press `0` to enter suppress mode, then hold down buttons you want to remove, or hold `shift` to suppress all
